heading: Deliveries
subtitle: All your scheduled and past deliveries

empty.title: No Deliveries Scheduled
empty.description: When you schedule letters, they'll appear here with their delivery status.

toasts.retryDescription: The delivery will be attempted again.

cancelDialog.title: Cancel Delivery?

lockWarning.title: Credit Will NOT Be Refunded
lockWarning.description: This delivery is within the 72-hour lock window ({time} remaining). Your {creditType} credit will be lost if you cancel.

refundInfo.title: Credit Will Be Refunded
refundInfo.description: Your {creditType} credit will be returned to your account when you cancel this delivery.

cancelDialog.explanation: Canceling will stop this delivery from being sent. The letter itself will remain in your account as a draft.

toasts.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
